mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HR( EMP_NO, DEP_NO, ADMIN_LEVEL, EMP_RANK, EMP_POSITION, EMP_NAME, EMAIL, EMP_PWD, ENTRY_DATE ) VALUES( HR_SEQ.nextval, #{depNo}, #{adminLevel}, #{empRank}, #{empPosition}, #{empName}, #{email}, #{empPwd}, #{entryDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT EMP_NO, D.DEP_NAME, EMP_RANK, EMP_POSITION, EMP_NAME, ENTRY_DATE FROM HR INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D on D.DEP_NO = HR.DEP_NO WHERE RESIGN_YN = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE HR SET EMP_NAME = #{empName}, EMAIL = #{email}, ENTRY_DATE = #{entryDate}, DEP_NO = #{depNo}, EMP_POSITION = #{empPosition}, EMP_RANK = #{empRank}, ADMIN_LEVEL = #{adminLevel} WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo}
mapper.select: SELECT DEP_NAME, TOTAL_NUM FROM ( SELECT DEP_NO, COUNT(EMP_NO) AS TOTAL_NUM FROM HR GROUP BY DEP_NO ) A INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D on D.DEP_NO = A.DEP_NO WHERE D.DEP_NO = #{depNo}
